A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually this film was stunning - Mark Hamill did a wonderful job with the script that was given to him. The \"dark\" path they put his character on wasn't the issue - the issue is that you care no more about the new characters than you did at the end of TFA. This entire thing felt completely shallow\, absorbed with being as edgy and dark as possible while forgetting that character developement and heart are required.
